p: Expression of Cbs was not altered by the experimental diets in either wild type or liver-specific phb1 +/− mice. Expression of cystathionase ( Cth) was higher in wild-type mice fed both the CDD and SPD, compared with the normal diet, but no differences in Cth expression were recorded in liver-specific phb1 +/− mice. Expressions of glutamate-cysteine ligase catalytic subunit ( Gclc), glutamate-cysteine ligase modifier subunit ( Gclm), and GSH synthetase ( Gss), which are involved in the synthesis of GSH, were significantly lower in liver-specific phb1 +/− mice fed the SPD compared with than the normal diet; no differences in expression of these genes were observed in wild-type mice.
